description: Try our easy to follow Star Lord Lunch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Star Lord Lunch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Snack 1: To make sweet potato, brown rice & feta space balls, Preheat oven to 180oC. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place sweet potato and 1 tbs water in a microwavesafe dish. Cover and microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Cool. Place sweet potato in a bowl and mash until smooth. Add rice, sunflower seeds and feta and stir to combine. Roll tablespoons of mixture into 12 balls and place on prepared tray. Spray lightly with oil and bake, turning halfway through cooking time, for 15 minutes or until golden. Cool completely. Place in an airtight container in fridge until ready to pack in lunch box. Serves 4 (makes 12) 3. Snack 2: To make fruit & seed yoghurt, top yoghurt with pepitas and sultanas. note: sweet potato, brown rice & feta space balls recipe serves 4

Cover and microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Cool. Place sweet potato in a bowl and mash until smooth. Add rice, sunflower seeds and feta and stir to combine. Roll tablespoons of mixture into 12 balls and place on prepared tray. Spray lightly with oil and bake, turning halfway through cooking time, for 15 minutes or until golden. Cool completely. Place in an airtight container in fridge until ready to pack in lunch box. Serves 4 (makes 12) 3. Snack 2: To make fruit & seed yoghurt, top yoghurt with pepitas and sultanas. note: sweet potato, brown rice & feta space balls recipe serves 4
